attributes.action: stop lorries from overtaking in the middle lane at 56mph, reducing the speed of traffic!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lorries should stay in the inside lane! The cause of conjestion on motorways is the direct result of a lorries pulling out in front of smooth flowing traffic resulting in a back log of traffic waiting to pull into lane 3. This might not sound like too much of a pain if it is only one lorry, put if there are three 0r four  trying to overtake it restricts the flow of two lanes to 56 mph at crutial times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
